Variables
socket
var socket

Make connection to the socket

Game Variables
playerChoice

Choice of player 1

opponentChoice

Choice of player 2

winner

an integer from 1 to 4 based on the choice matrix

roomID

4 character string ID for each room generated by Randomstring

playerType

boolean which is true for first player

playerName

self assigned player name

scoreboard
var scoreboard

stores updated scores of player 1 and player 2

Functions
play
function play(
e
)

Play game

Parameters
e

Choice of the player

ResultDisplay
function ResultDisplay(
res,
opponentChoice
)

Display result after every round

Parameters
res

score of the round

opponentChoice

Choice of the opponent player

showFinalScore
function showFinalScore()

Display the final result to each player

showWinner
function showWinner(
winner,
opponentChoice,
gameCnt,
totalGames
)

Calculates the score for each round and adds it to the scoreboard

Parameters
winner

an integer from 1 to 4 based on the choice matrix

opponentChoice

Choice of the opponent player

gameCnt

Counter which increments on each round

totalGames

Total number of games
